text: NGC 438 is a spiral galaxy of type (R')SAB(s)b: located in the constellation Sculptor. It was discovered on September 1, 1834 by John Herschel. It was described by Dreyer as "pretty faint, small, round, gradually a little brighter middle." ==References== ==External links== * 0438 18340901 Category:Sculptor (constellation) Category:Spiral galaxies
title: NGC 438
